author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Why coronavirus could be catastrophic for Venezuela
description: Its dire economic and precarious political state means it is ill-equipped to deal with the virus.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Venezuela could be facing a perfect storm
Venezuelan state television usually consists of wall-to-wall coverage of the government's daily achievements, press conferences and rambling speeches by President Nicolás Maduro.… [+6170 chars]
